title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.1 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations

This Part establishes the process and standards governing the

Office's approval of Clinical Review Criteria used by Utilization Review Agents
that register with the New York State Department of Health pursuant to Article
49 of the Public Health Law or report to the New York State Department of

Financial Services pursuant to Article 49 of the Insurance Law to determine
health care coverage for any treatment or service for a Mental

Illness. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
514.1

Adopted

New

York State Register May 15, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 20, eff. 5/15/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
